pr_title: Change built-in SpanProcessor implementations to ignore more than one shutdown call

timeline.message:
Change built-in SpanProcessor implementations to ignore more than one shutdown call

Signed-off-by: Sergei Malafeev <sergei@malafeev.org>

timeline.bodyText: synchronized (this) is always a bad idea, as you open yourself for deadlock if somebody external decides to synchronise on this object instance. In this particular case I think AtomicBoolean is better than volatile+lock
timeline.author: iNikem

timeline.message:
refactor with AtomicBoolean
